original_text: Rules like that are only about things that spoil when you use them. They are rules that come from human ideas.
korean_text: 이 모든 것은 한때 쓰이고는 없어지리라) 사람의 명령과 가르침을 따르느냐

sentences.original_text: Rules like that are only about things
sentences.korean_translation: 그런 규칙은 단지 어떤 것들에 대한 것입니다

sentences.original_text: that spoil when you use them
